name: Super Ghost Ball - The Life Spark
name_original: Super Ghost Ball - The Life Spark
description:
Super Ghost Ball - The Life Spark is a 2-4 player (local) ball fighting game played using controllers. The mouse can however be used to navigate the menu.

This game was made as a project while on at school trip and there for we had to document the process, here's a link if you should be intetessered in it.

http://gameitswag.tumblr.com/
